730331f-a.title: General view - East Broadway - South.
730331f-a.text:
esN
A general (Bird's Eye) view, south from,Broadway, at eike Street,
showing on the left the East River and on the right the Hudson River.
Al1 the piers south from the Manhattan Bridge are seen and the
Brooklyn Bridge midway between the Battery (southerw extremity of
Manhattan).  The Manhattan Bridga is in the foreground. (The
Manhattan Bridge extends from between Market and Pike Streets, to the
Williamsburg Section of the Borough of Kings). The Brooklyn Bridge
extends from near North William and Frankfort Streets, to the Borough
of Kings iBrooklyn).
1927.
International News.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
730331f-a.folder: East Broadway and Pike Street, Manhattan, N.Y.

719418f-a.title: Manhattan: East Broadway - Pike Street.
719418f-a.text:
113 East Broadway, adjoining the S.W.
corner of Pike Street, showing solely the
entrance to same. Note the M. D.s shingle in
the window at the left.
March 30, 1937
